I recently had the pleasure of visiting Hourglass @ Takashimaya outlet was blown away by the exceptional service provided by Arthur Ng.

Arthur's knowledge of the watches was unparalleled, and his passion for horology was evident throughout our interaction. He took the time to understand my preferences and offered personalized recommendations, helping me find the perfect timepiece.

What impressed me most was Arthur's attention to detail and his willingness to go the extra mile to ensure I was satisfied. He patiently answered all my questions, and his professionalism and courtesy made the entire experience a pleasure.

I highly recommend Hourglass to anyone seeking a genuine and hassle-free watch-buying experience. Arthur's exceptional service has earned my loyalty, and I will definitely be returning.

Special thanks to Arthur for his outstanding service!"

I recently collected my long-awaited timepiece, and the experience was nothing short of exceptional. From start to finish, Fancy, who had been assisting me for weeks leading up to the collection, demonstrated unparalleled professionalism. She was incredibly accommodating to my schedule, courteous, and maintained excellent follow-through throughout the process.

During the collection, her attention to detail stood out as she thoroughly explained the care instructions for my watch and guided me on my watch journey, even sparking my interest in exploring other pieces. Her friendly and affirming demeanor made the experience even more memorable.

I also noticed the seamless teamwork and collaboration among the staff, who supported each other to ensure the purchasing process was smooth for every client.

The newly renovated space added to the overall experience with its aesthetically pleasing ambiance, making the visit even more enjoyable.

Kudos to Fancy and the entire Hourglass team for their outstanding service and dedication. I look forward to returning in the future!
